greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First order recursion: a(0)=5; a(n)=prime(n)-a(n-1).
comment: Same function as in A083236 but initial value = 5.
formula: Same implicit relationship: a(n-1)+a(n)=prime(n), the n-th prime;
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 23 2003
